https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/o3xE1J14VtRDuERA9kOxSEdimws.jpg Arctic Tale is a 2007 documentary film from the National Geographic Society about the life cycle of a walrus and her calf, and a polar bear and her cubs, in a similar vein to the 2005 hit production March of the Penguins, also from National Geographic. Arctic Tale
